email_title: Design partners get in first: secure early access to Aire
email_preview: Priority access to Aire Labs platform - limited spots for fall development projects.
hero_intro_text: As we've progressed from research to design to building, one question has come up more and more: how do I start using Aire Labs? This update is our answer.

hero_text_blocks.text: We've opened onboarding for our first wave of users onto the Aire Labs platform.
If you want to develop your project using Aire Labs this fall, now's the time to sign up.
Spots are limited and we're prioritizing teams actively developing projects.
